overview: Girl is a pre-teen who exists in an artificially constructed world. A pair of omnipotent hands assembles and dismantles the spaces around her. She's aware that something is changing but isn't sure how much of it is coming from within her or from the circumstances created for her. Will this external power always exist to influence her actions and desires?
tagline: A SHORT MEDITATION ON BECOMING AND BEING.
title: Boys Clap, Girls Dance
